page.title: 04BUCKFAST ABBEY
page.content: gold.There was one memorial to the rebuilding of the{Abbey}which was made of bronze.There are about seventy monks living in the Abbey.There is a special balcony for the sick and old monks to watch the Abbey services.When the{Abbey}was rebuilt only six monks were working on it at a time and only one monk had,had experience of building.The rebuilding went through the First World War and nearly two decades after that. We were also fortunate to meet{ {Brother Adam,}the world's expert on bee-keeping.He has been doing this since 1914,when he became ill.Before that he was a stone-mason.
